preface: The purpose of this usability test is to evaluate the effectiveness of my individual projectportfolio website. The website's design, layout, navigation, and content will be tested todetermine if it meets the needs of its intended target audience. The test will be conductedusing the principles of the CMD Methods Pack, which includes a series of standardisedtasks and measures to ensure consistency and reliability of the results.
title: Usability Test -
method: To approach this research the guidelines of the CMD Methods pack will be used. Which are as follows: 'Detect problems users have with your design and correct these before the product goes live.'.
research: What is the overall usability and effectiveness of the individual project portfolio website, asassessed by a sample of three users of the target audience?
findings: 3 participants were reqruited for this test, to read more about the findings of this test use the button below.
conclusion:
The results of this usability test provided valuable insights into the effectiveness of theindividual project portfolio website.

Overall, the website was found to have a visually appealing design and layout that was easyto navigate. The individual project case study was also well-received by the participants. Based on the feedback received, improvements will be made to the About Me section, such as adding more personal details and visual elements to make it more interesting andengaging.

Additionally, more projects will be added to the portfolio in the future to showcase a widerrange of skills.

sources.title: CMD Methods Pack - find a combination of research methods that suit your needs. (n.d.).
